post.subject: Travel Encounters | Radiant Feldspar
post.content: Speaking of the Radiant Feldspar, we also have to mention its unique place in the history of Penacony's airship design. In terms of the merging of luxury and functionality, the Radiant Feldspar is considered to be the pinnacle of technical airship design! Here, guests can enjoy dishes from various celestial systems, take a leisurely dream bubble swim, stay up all night in the arcade... Or they can also enjoy the magnificent sights and scenes across Penacony on the deck to end out a glorious day. It's got the relaxation of a vacation and the thrill of an adventure. Everyone who's been about the Feldspar all come back stating it was a trip worth taking. As such, if you have the chance to go, you got to seize the opportunity, Trailblazer...

Or they can also enjoy the magnificent sights and scenes across Penacony on the deck to end out a glorious day. It's got the relaxation of a vacation and the thrill of an adventure. Everyone who's been about the Feldspar all come back stating it was a trip worth taking. As such, if you have the chance to go, you got to seize the opportunity, Trailblazer...

post.content: "When you were but a child, you must have tried tossing stones into the water, and found joy in the act, yes?" "Then, since the ripples are destined to vanish, have you ever considered exactly why we cast the stones?" "The answer is simple: only the one tossing the stone knows what kind of ripples the stone will create — and what kinds of joy will be born out of the twisted shadows on the water."

post.subject: After the Version 2.3 update, you can claim the Trailblazer (Harmony: Imaginary) directly through the event page.
post.content: Dear Trailblazer, your expedition in Penacony is approaching its end, but your adventures on the Path of Harmony will continue. After the Version 2.3 update, Trailblazers who complete the Trailblaze Mission ""Jarilo-VI — The Return" can claim Trailblazer (Harmony)" from the "When Charmony Rings Out..." event interface. This character will be permanently available for claiming. If you have already unlocked the Path of Harmony, you will obtain Shadow of Harmony ×1 instead.
